criteria: Looking for experienced developers with 5+ years in React, Node.js, and cloud platforms. Must have leadership experience and strong communication skills.
Need someone with 2-4 years experience in digital marketing, proficient in Google Ads, Facebook Ads, and analytics platforms. Creative mindset required.
Seeking data scientists with Python/R expertise, machine learning background, and experience with big data tools. PhD preferred but not required.
Looking for mid-level product designers with strong UX research skills, proficiency in design tools, and experience in mobile app design.
Need experienced sales manager with team leadership experience, B2B sales background, and proven track record of exceeding targets.
